question: Swachh Swasth Sarvatra was recently launched in New Delhi. It is a joint initiative of which two ministries?
option1: Union Ministry of Drinking Water and Sanitation and Union Ministry of Human Resource Development
option2: Union Ministry of Health & Family Welfare and Union Ministry of Drinking Water and Sanitation
option3: Union Ministry of Health & Family Welfare and Union Ministry of Human Resource Development
answer: Union Ministry of Health & Family Welfare and Union Ministry of Drinking Water and Sanitation
